name: The Jig Machine
description:
NOTE: The game doesn't keep a score because I didn't have time to implement that....

As a bonus, you can look at the audio files for the songs I didn't have time to implement.

sorry if it's hard to see the black circles. it looked fine on the laptop i developed this on, but it's kind of hard to see on my actual monitor...

CONTROLS: j k l ;

controls can be configured in keymap.txt if these keys aren't comfortable on your keyboard. be warned about editing that though, the program can crash if it is not formatted how it expects. controller is also supported, and configurable in the same file.
